text.tspan: (a) discard a card at random from

g.style: font-size:18px;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;line-height:125%;letter-spacing:0px;word-spacing:0px;fill:#000000;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;font-family:Old English Text MT;-inkscape-font-specification:Old English Text MT

text.tspan: Remove from deck if played as event or
(b) force any power to skip their next
as a 'pass' towards ending the turn).
Either a or b may also be played as an
event in the player's own impulse to count
as the player's activity for that round.
